Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
# Load IIS module:
Import-Module WebAdministration
# Set a name of the site we want to recycle the pool for:
$siteName = $OctopusParameters['SiteName']
# Get pool name by the site name:
$pool = (Get-Item "IIS:\Sites\$siteName"| Select-Object applicationPool).applicationPool
# Recycle the application pool:
Restart-WebAppPool $pool

Parameters.Name: SiteName
Parameters.Label: Site Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the site in IIS
